mapper.select: SELECT subject.id AS subjectId, message.id AS id, message.last_sent_at AS sentAt, message.message AS message FROM (SELECT * FROM TbSubject WHERE last_sent_at < #{afterSentAt} ORDER BY last_sent_at DESC LIMIT 15) AS subject JOIN TbKaMessage AS message ON message.chat_id = subject.last_sent_chat_id
SELECT file.hash AS hash, file.ext AS ext FROM (SELECT file_hash FROM TbFileMessageRelation WHERE message_id = #{messageId}) as fml LEFT JOIN TbKaFile AS file ON file.hash = fml.file_hash
